pros: I worked with IntraCare North for appx 8 years. During those 8 years I realized if you invest in them, they'll invest in you. IntraCare is a learning hospital where education is valued and all feedback is important. They provide great customer service and patient care! The team at ICN are vigilant and also treat everyone with courtesy, dignity and hope. This is a place that live their mission. They walk the walk and talk the talk. ICN is often in demand due to patients being so much better when they get out. I know this by personal experience when my loved one had a psychotic break and was sent to ICN. They stabilized him, provided educational tools and explained why these things are important. Tools in his tool kit to pull out when needed. He's 5 years being med compliant and no use of substances. Thank you ICN for giving me my brother back and a better quality of life
cons: Often can be at capacity due to high demand

review_title: Pay bare minimum because they only hire people with provisional license
pros: You are able to get experience
cons: They make it clear that there is no long-term investment in you

pros: There are great people that worked here

review_title: Great place to grow clinical skills
pros: This job was rewarding to work with patients and I had a wonderful team to work with in the end.
cons: Unfortunately, due to funding, the program shut down. Communication was lacking between departments and seemed kind of high school vibes.

pros: Loved all the kids I worked with.
cons: Everything. Management, the kid’s basic needs weren’t met, understaffed, paid low

job_title: Mental Health Technician in Houston, TX
cons: It is under staffed, need more workers.

review_title: Great place to learn, but high burnout
pros:
Great place to increase clinical skills and work with a variety of diagnoses 
Work with a large multidisciplinary team
CEUs onsite monthly
Good healthcare coverage
cons:
High burnout and turnover 
Low pay

pros: It’s a cool place to work
cons: Can’t really move up in the company

pros: great place to gain some experience.
